## FlatTileBoundingBoxGenerator.getGeoBox() method

Returns the bounding box in geo coordinates for the given \[\[TileKey\]\].

Example:

```typescript
const geoBox = generator.getGeoBox(worldBounds);
console.log(geoBox.center);

```

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getGeoBox(tileKey: TileKey): GeoBox;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tileKey | [TileKey](./harp-geoutils.tilekey.md) | The \[\[TileKey\]\]. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[GeoBox](./harp-geoutils.geobox.md)
